    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • depth

        public SubmissionRequest.Builder depth(java.lang.Integer depth)
        Sets the maximum amount of subtrees returned by this request. If the number is less than 1, it is ignored by the Reddit API and no depth restriction is enacted. A null value will exclude this parameter.

      • limit

        public SubmissionRequest.Builder limit(java.lang.Integer limit)
        Sets the maximum amount of comments to return. A null value will exclude this parameter.

      • context

        public SubmissionRequest.Builder context(java.lang.Integer context)

        Sets the number of parents shown in relation to the focused comment. For example, if the focused comment is in the eighth level of the comment tree (meaning there are seven replies above it), and the context is set to six, then the response will also contain the six direct parents of the given comment. For a better understanding, play with this link.

        A null value will exclude this parameter.

      • sort

        public SubmissionRequest.Builder sort(CommentSort sort)
        Sets the sorting for the comments in the response. This will be used to request more comments using CommentNode.loadMoreComments(net.dean.jraw.RedditClient). A null value will exclude this parameter.

      • focus

        public SubmissionRequest.Builder focus(java.lang.String commentId)
        Sets the ID of the comment to focus on. If this comment does not exist, then this parameter is ignored. Otherwise, only one comment tree is returned: the one in which the given comment resides.

      • build

        public SubmissionRequest build()
        Creates a new SubmissionRequest
